name: Solitudinem
description:
This Game talks about 4 different feelings that I, myself feel on the daily. They are talking to you and you need to understand what is going on.

Its a short but simple game, I wanted to make a game about needing space and being in space so why not put them in one game! 

What to do: Go up to the consoles, The ones with and stand and a iPad thing on it, and get a message from one of the emotions out there.

Thank you for trying my game! Please rate it or comment on how it went!

Brian

Acorn Head Games
